mapper.select: SELECT #{startDate} AS biz_date ,COALESCE(a.adverter_code, '未知') AS adverter_code ,COALESCE(a.app_code, '未知') AS app_code ,COALESCE(SUM(a.click_cnt), 0) AS click_cnt ,COALESCE(SUM(a.active_cnt), 0) AS active_cnt ,COALESCE(SUM(a.callback_cnt), 0) AS callback_cnt FROM (SELECT adverter_code ,app_code ,COUNT(1) AS click_cnt ,NULL AS active_cnt ,NULL AS callback_cnt FROM report_log_${tableDate} GROUP BY adverter_code ,app_code UNION ALL SELECT adverter_code ,app_code ,NULL AS click_cnt ,COUNT(1) AS active_cnt ,COUNT(if(is_call = 1, 1, NULL)) AS callback_cnt FROM callback_log WHERE create_time >= #{startDate} AND create_time < #{endDate} GROUP BY adverter_code ,app_code) a GROUP BY a.adverter_code ,a.app_code;

SELECT a.idfa AS idfa ,a.app_code AS app_code ,a.report_time AS report_time ,b.update_time AS callback_time FROM (SELECT idfa ,app_code ,report_time FROM report_log_${tableDate} WHERE idfa = #{idfa} AND app_code = #{appCode}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT update_time FROM callback_log WHERE idfa = #{idfa} AND app_code = #{appCode} AND is_call = 1) b ON 1 = 1

SELECT a.adverter_code AS adverter_code ,a.app_code AS app_code ,a.call_back_rate_limit AS call_back_rate_limit ,c.callback_cnt/b.report_cnt AS call_back_rate ,a.warning_email AS warning_email FROM (SELECT adverter_code ,app_code ,call_back_rate_limit ,warning_email FROM advert_info) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT app_code ,adverter_code ,COUNT(1) AS report_cnt FROM report_log_${tableDate} WHERE report_time >= #{startTime} AND report_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY app_code ,adverter_code) b ON a.adverter_code = b.adverter_code AND a.app_code = b.app_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT app_code ,adverter_code ,COUNT(1) AS callback_cnt FROM callback_log WHERE is_call = 1 AND create_time >= #{startTime} AND create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY app_code ,adverter_code) c ON a.app_code = c.app_code AND a.adverter_code = c.adverter_code WHERE a.call_back_rate_limit > 0 AND a.call_back_rate_limit < (c.callback_cnt/b.report_cnt)
